name: Boris the Baiter
response: Boris the Baiter is a troll who enjoys teasing with steady persistence rather than sudden chaos. He tolerates insurance with little enthusiasm and shows indifference to pharma, often shrugging it off. However, when it comes to crypto, Boris shines with excitement, laying siege armed with rotten turnips and pure spite. He thrives on the slow torture of teasing rather than rushing into action.
